meanings.definition: A unit of energy equal to one watt-second.

meanings.sent3: The battery was so powerful, it could store a whole jun of energy!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a jun of energy, always bright and lively.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm crackled with the power of a jun, lighting up the sky.
